name: Fish Out of Water (Warl0cktopus)
description:
An atmospheric flying/swimming game with some platforming elements. Done for SNHU's April Game Jam.

  • Maxen McCoy: Level Design, Environment Art, Shaders & Visuals, Programming
  • Daniel Bourke: Programming & Character Controller
  • Audrey Berkau: Character Art & Animation

Controls:
You play as a flying fish. You can swim freely in the water, and glide in the air. 

  • Wind Currents will push you in the direction they are going.
  • While in the Water:
    • Turn using the mouse/left stick
    • Press W/Right Stick forward to swim forward
  • While in the Air:
    • Turn using the mouse/left stick
    • You can only glide while airborne. Tilting downward will gain speed, tilting up will slow you down.
    • If you are not moving above a minimum speed, you will begin to fall. 
  • Checkpoint Reset: E/Controller West Button
  • Menu: Escape/Start
